body: The Princess of Aleister is a member of the royal family that rules the Kingdom of Aleister in [[shadowverse]]. It is [[Erika (Shadowverse)|]]'s sworn duty to protect her.

title: killmonger
body: Erik Killmonger (né N'Jadaka) is a supervillain appearing in American comic books published by [[marvel|Marvel Comics]]. Created by Don McGregor and Rich Buckler, he first appeared in Jungle Action #6 (September 1973). The character is commonly depicted as a skilled hunter and mercenary born in the fictional African nation of Wakanda, who holds a grudge against the country and its people after his biological parents were killed when he was young. Raised outside of Wakanda, he eventually returns as a revolutionary leader and terrorist to exact his revenge, and repeatedly challenges the nation's king and protector, [[Black Panther (marvel)|]], who becomes his most prominent adversary.

title: shuri_(marvel)
body: Character from [[Marvel]], the princess of Wakanda, Shuri is the sister of [[Black Panther (marvel)|]], and an heiress to the throne of Wakanda. She is the youngest child of T'Chaka, his only daughter and only biological child with Queen Ramonda, his third wife.

title: the_owl_house
body:
The Owl House is a Disney animated series created by [[Dana Terrace]].

The series follows [[Luz Noceda]], a 14 year old Dominican-American teen who finds herself in another world on a magical land called the Boiling Isles. 

There, she befriends [[Edalyn Clawthorne]], an infamous witch known as "The Owl Lady" and [[king clawthorne|King]], a demon dog who claims to be the King of Demons, and attends the Hexside Academy to fulfill her dream of learning magic where adventure awaits her.

title: xxx_(meme)
body: XXX refers to Vin Diesel's 2002 action/adventure film "XXX". Gamer tags during the early 2010s in the MLG era uses xX or xxX often with underscores opposing beside their names. It also means "Rated X". A rating placed in pornographic shows and films suggesting that only 18 years old to above are allowed to view or they are not for general public because of their highly mature content.

title: sakigake_no_hanamiko
body:
English title: Leader of the Flower Shrine Maidens

Manga written and illustrated by [[ryouma_(galley)]]. The titular hanamiko are [[miko|shrine maidens]] who fight against [[demon|demon-like]] gods of calamity and entertain gods of fortune similar to how [[geisha]] entertained their guests by performing Japanese arts, such as dance, music and singing, as well as being proficient conversationalists and hosts. The "hanamiko" is in reference to Hanamikoji, the famous geisha street.

title: melty_q_melromarc
body: The Second Princess of Melromarc and a supporting character in [[Tate no Yuusha no Nariagari]]. She is the younger sister of [[Malty S Melromarc]] and the daughter of Queen [[Mirellia Q Melromarc]]. She is the opposite of her twisted, manipulative sister. She has [[long hair|long]], [[blue hair]], [[twintails]], [[purple eyes]], [[sidelocks]], and [[small breasts]]. Her [[hair ribbon|hair ribbons]] are typically [[blue ribbon|blue]] or [[purple ribbon|purple]].
other_names: メルティ=メルロマルク

title: euphyllia_magenta
body:
Character in [[Tensei Oujo to Tensai Reijou no Mahou Kakumei]].

She has [[purple eyes]] and [[long hair|long]] [[grey hair|grey]] to [[blue hair]] with a [[braid]] & [[hair between eyes]]. She wears a [[yellow bow|yellow]] [[hair bow]], a [[hair ornament]], [[white capelet]], [[white shirt|white]] [[shirt tucked in]] a [[blue skirt|blue]] [[long skirt|long]] [[frilled skirt|frilled]] [[high-waist skirt]], [[blue ribbon]], [[blue corset]], [[black pantyhose]], and [[black footwear|black]] [[high heels]].

She is voiced by [[Iwami Manaka]].
other_names: ユフィリア・マゼンタ

title: tensei_oujo_to_tensai_reijou_no_mahou_kakumei
body:
[b]Tensei Oujo to Tensai Reijou no Mahou Kakumei[/b] is a 2020-to-present light novel series written by Karasu Piero with illustrations by [[Kisaragi Yuri]]. There is a manga adaptation with art by [[Nadaka Harutsugu]] and a Winter 2023 anime adaption by Diomedéa.

title: suki_(hojo_studio)
body:
A Vietnamese [[Magical Girl]] [[virtual youtuber|VTuber]] and a member of [[Hojo Studio]]. Originally she was a Pretty Cure but she lost her power during a pitched fight. As such, she has no choice but to befriend with other members of [[Hojo Studio]] as she has to restart her life again.

title: takasaki_yu
body:
One of the main characters that appear in [[Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club]] anime. Her official design was revealed during the announcement of the anime, and her official name was decided by community via a poll. She takes the place of [[love live! school idol festival all stars|School Idol Festival ALL STARS]]'s [[anata-chan (love live!)|player-insert character]] in the anime.

She has [[green eyes]] and [[medium hair|medium]], [[two-tone hair]] with [[black hair|black]] that [[gradient hair|transitions into]] [[green hair|green]] [[streaked hair|highlights]] on her [[twintails]] and bangs reaching [[hair between eyes|between her eyes]]. She wears [[black thighhighs]] with her [[nijigasaki school uniform|uniform]].

Yu is childhood friends with [[Uehara Ayumu]] and is in the same class as her. She functions as the group's lyricist and composer.

h4. Profile

Height: 156 cm
Year Level: 2nd Year
Seiyuu: [[Yano Hinaki]]

title: man_watching_tv_(meme)
body:
